I think at first I was dreaming cause when I first woke, I distinctly heard the loud beeping of a forklift right in my left ear and remember thinking Jennifer‚Äôs son Max must be down here moving stuff around before I realized how silly that thought was. I also felt like I was being pulled down towards the foot of the bed but was using a nightstand as a marker and knowing I wasn‚Äôt actually moving anywhere. Finally it happened. To my left was this humanoid shadow thing moving towards me. I was more fascinated than panicked. About the time it reached me it faded and I was finally able to move again. I get why people think spooks and demons are real.
